Get ready for the ultimate loaded fries experience with Wendy’s Baconator fries. The only fries worthy of the Baconator name.The best cheesy chips aroundDon’t be fooled: these fries aren’t the side dish – they’re the main event. Start with a tonne load of our natural-cut, skin-on, sea-salted fries. Perfectly golden on the outside, extra fluffy on the inside. Then, add a layer of warm creamy cheese sauce, shredded cheddar and top with crispy Applewood smoked bacon. Perfect for sharing (or keeping all for yourself).

Introducing Wendy’s fries – our signature chips.The SidekickNatural-cut, skin-on, sea-salted, our French fries are crispy and golden brown on the outside and warm and fluffy on the inside. Team it with your favourite burger, drench it in some creamy sauce or dip in your Wendy’s Frosty for the perfect satisfying side. It’s pure art.

Craving something cheesy? Get your hands on our delicious cheese fries made from the squeakiest cheese around.The irresistible snackIf you’re a fan of grilled halloumi, then you’ll love our indulgent, deep fried halloumi fries. Crispy and golden on the outside, soft and heavenly on the inside, our halloumi fries are the perfect add-on when regular French fries just won’t do. Made with seasoned, lightly battered halloumi cheese, they’re best served with a sweet chilli dipping sauce.

Delight in a bite-sized treat! Light and fluffy mini ring doughnuts coated with a sugar and cinnamon topping.​ Available all-day, treat yourself to a playful, nostalgic dessert that's impossible to resist!

Cool, creamy and refreshing – give in to your sweet tooth with Wendy’s Vanilla Frosty®.The iconic frozen dessertWhether you’re a die-hard Frosty® fan or just looking for your sweet treat fix, Wendy’s signature showstopper is the diva of desserts. Like a Vanilla milkshake, only thicker and creamier, the Vanilla Frosty® is thick enough to eat with a spoon and smooth enough to use a straw. For the perfect blend of sweet and salty, dip your fries into you Frosty® – trust us, it’s delicious.
